rooms.Name: Attic
rooms.Text: When exiting, you must attempt a Speed roll of 3+. If you fail, lose 1 Might (but continue moving).

rooms.Name: Catacombs
rooms.Text: You can attempt a Sanity roll of 6+ to cross. If you fail, you stop moving.

rooms.Name: Chapel
rooms.Text: Once per game, if you end your turn here, gain 1 Sanity.

rooms.Name: Chasm
rooms.Text: You can attempt a Speed roll of 3+ to cross. If you fail, you stop moving.

rooms.Name: Coal Chute
rooms.Text: One-way slide to Basement Landing.

rooms.Name: Collapsed Room
rooms.Text: You must attempt a Speed roll of 5+ to avoid falling. If you fail the roll, draw a basement tile and put it in play. You fall there and take 1 die of physical damage.

rooms.Name: Crypt
rooms.Text: If you end your turn here, take 1 point of mental damage.

rooms.Name: Furnace Room
rooms.Text: If you end your turn here, take 1 point of physical damage.

rooms.Name: Gallery
rooms.Text: You can choose to fall to the Ballroom if it's in the house. If you do, take 1 die of physical damage.

rooms.Name: Grand Staircase
rooms.Text: Leads to Upper Landing

rooms.Name: Graveyard
rooms.Text: When exiting, you must attempt a Sanity roll of 4+. If you fail, lose 1 Knowledge (but continue moving).

rooms.Name: Gymnasium
rooms.Text: Once per game, if you end your turn here, gain 1 Speed.

rooms.Name: Junk Room
rooms.Text: When exiting, you must attempt a Might roll of 3+. If you fail, lose 1 Speed (but continue moving).

rooms.Name: Larder
rooms.Text: Once per game, if you end your turn here, gain 1 Might.

rooms.Name: Library
rooms.Text: Once per game, if you end your turn here, gain 1 Knowledge.

rooms.Name: Mystic Elevator
rooms.Text: Once per turn, roll 2 dice and move this room next to any open door on: 4) Any floor 3) Upper floor 2) Ground floor 1) Basement 0) Basement, then take 1 die of physical damage.

rooms.Name: Pentagram Chamber
rooms.Text: When exiting, you must attempt a Knowledge roll of 4+. If you fail, lose 1 sanity (but continue moving).

rooms.Name: Stairs From Basement
rooms.Text: Leads to and from Foyer

rooms.Name: Tower
rooms.Text: You can attempt a Might roll of 3+ to cross. If you fail, you stop moving.

rooms.Name: Vault
rooms.Text: You can attempt a Knowledge roll of 6+ to open and empty the vault.
